description: Developed Full Scale Web Applications known as widgets that served Product Lifecycle Management business requirement for more than 6 projects of Proctor & Gamble client.
Mainly used frontend frameworks such as VueJS framework(ES6 JavaScript), Vuetify, Ag-grid, etc. for UI development.
Built RESTful Web Services in Java as backend with Oracle MQL database.
Exposure to NodeJS & NPM.
Implemented complex business logics for multiple projects and procedures.
Worked on Bug Fixing, Analyzing, Developing clean, scalable and reusable code, Upgrading & Migrating web applications.
Used tools such as Webpack for file bundling, GitHub, SVN & JIRA.
Actively contributed to Widget COE community that developed and supported reusable components.
Delivered presentations on best coding practices and new concepts in VueJS and ES6 JavaScript.
Developed Web Applications for Machine Learning algorithms and models in Data Analyst Department as per organizational requirements.
Mainly worked on JavaScript, HTML/CSS, JQuery and Bootstrap.
Also developed several machine learning models based on algorithms on projects undertaken by Contriver.

value.institution: Vidya Vikas Institute of Engineering and Technology

value.name: NGF Physical Chemical Properties Prototype
description: Next-Generation Formulation widget integrating on-premises with cloud environment.
The widget enables seamless PLM management of Formulation and other data types.
Widget encompasses complex various fields and properties intrinsically dependent on each other, thus being highily dynamic with business logic.
Mainly worked on UI design using VueJS framework, JavaScript, HTML/CSS.
Single-handedly worked on the application development for a duration of 3 months.

value.name: Local Co-Ordinator Prototype
description: Highly interactive and powerful widget 3DEXPERIENCE Platform that assists in seamless management of Business Objects of type POA by providing PLM services.
The widget being a successor of an old RTA tool, mainly provided insights on complex relations between Business Objects with options to modify data or create & connect business objects.
Development time for the project spanned 6 months with the use of VueJS Framework and RESTful web services in Java.

value.name: Study Protocol
description: Light weight widget developed to provide PLM to Business Object of type Study Protocol.
The widget incorporated advanced UI features such as Drag & Drop and Publish Subscribe Events to interact with other widgets.
Developed using VueJS Framework and RESTful web services in Java, I worked on providing debugging support and added new functionalities.

value.name: Employee Churn Prognostication
value.organization: Vidya Vikas Institute of Engineering and Technology
description: A machine learning project in python integrated with NodeJS server.
The ML model is trained to accurately predict the attrition of any employee and provide major reasons for churn.
Additionally, solutions to prevent this churn are also recommended.
The model also predicts how long an employee may retain in the company based on his history and data.
An appealing & interactive front-end web user interface is also coalesced.

value.name: General Scripts (Blog Website)
description: A blog website hosted on Heroku using NodeJS for server.
The source pages are stored remotely in GitHub repository.
The project uses HTML5, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap for frontend.
MongoDB is to be used as Database.

value.name: Authentication Using Facial Recognition
description: An android application created to capture sequence of pictures, recognize face using Digital Image Processing and detect facial changes such as eye blinks, expressions and movement for user authentication thereby providing suitable replacement for Captchas.

value.name: Handwritten Digit Recognition and Classification
description: A machine learning project built using SVM algorithm trained to recognize and classify handwritten digits ranging from 0 to 9.
The project implemented in python using scikit-learn library and the model has an accuracy of over 96 percent.

value.name: Luxurious Car Rental System
value.organization: Vidya Vikas Institute of Engineering and Technology
description: A web application providing Super and Luxurious Cars renting service.
Developed using Java Server Pages, HTML and CSS for front-end, MySQL as Database, Apache as web server, itâ€™s a robust project incorporating unique idea to extrapolate existing car rental service.

brief: Software Engineering Specialist with 2+ years of experience in Full Stack Development having worked on more than 4 projects.
B.E graduate in Computer Science, immensely passionate about Web Development and Programming.
Fundamental knowledge of software design with exceptional programming skills in JavaScript, VueJS and Java. Experienced and proficient in developing, debugging and improving software.
Effective communicator seamlessly able to adapt to new environments.
long: Software Engineering Specialist with 2+ years of experience in Full Stack Development having worked on more than 4 projects on Web UI and Web Services.
B.E graduate in Computer Science, immensely passionate about Web Development, Programming and Financial Markets.
Fundamental knowledge of software design with exceptional programming skills in JavaScript, VueJS and Java. Experienced and proficient in developing, debugging and improving software.
Keen interests lie majorly in UI Design, Backend Development, Financial Markets, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning.
Effective communicator seamlessly able to adapt to new environments. Always being on a  lookout for exponential growth, I am very eager to explore new opportunities and technologies.
